Jurisprudence.definition: a system or body of law [in the federal ] ;esp
Jurisprudence.origin: [Late Latin jurisprudentia knowledge of or skill in law, from Latin juris , genitive of jus right, law + prudentia wisdom, proficiency]

1 a.definition: a system or body of law [in the federal ]a body of law dealing with a specific issue or area [labor ]

sub_terms.b: the course of court decisions as distinguished from legislation and doctrine [the decided under the source provisions ""]

2.definition: the science or philosophy of law [they have no theories of butâ€¦decide each case on its facts "R. H. Bork"]
